name: Custom data-compression in Polygon zkEVM
description:
L2 data transaction cost is basically the cost of the  data-availability in L1. Therefore, reducing the data posted on-chain is key to decrease L2 transaction cost.
We introduce a very simple and custom function data set to compress data.

speakers.name: Carlos Matallana
speakers.bio:
Protocol blockchain engineer focused on L2 solutions.
Started working on Iden3 and then switch to develop the PoC of a rollup back in 2019.
Then, I started on Hermez network as a protocol engineer which became polygon zkEVM
